description.lang: Aeon Labs Home Energy Meter Gen5 is a Z-Wave device that can monitor the total amount of electricity of your home. It can report the wattage energy usage and KWH usage to a Z-Wave Controller (especially a gateway). In near real-time youll have a full understanding of how much electricity you use and when you use it.Products that are Z-Wave certified can be used and communicate with other Z-Wave certified devices. Also a tool that can be programmed, scheduled, controlled and communicated with from anywhere in the world.
Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.Automatic Reports will be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1.

name.lang: Induce an automatic report of Channel 2.

description.lang: This parameter is used to induce an automatic report (Channel 2) when the change of the current power is more/less than the threshold in percentage.
The threshold can be set from 0 to 100 percent.

name.lang: To set which report need to be sent.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure which reports need to be sent in Report Group 1.The values corresponding to the first four bits of the parameter value may be combined to create different combinations of reports that you wish to have sent.For example, instantaneous Current is the value 8 and instantaneous Watts is the value 2, so setting parameter 101 to a value of 10 will result in both instantaneous Current and instantaneous Watts to be reported.See the full description of the parameter values for other possible settings.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Watts of whole HEM.
Report Accumulated kWh of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 1.
Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 2.
Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 1.
Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 2.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 1.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 2.
Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 1.
Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 2.

name.lang: To set which report need to be sent.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure which reports need to be sent in Report Group 2.The values corresponding to the first four bits of the parameter value may be combined to create different combinations of reports that you wish to have sent.For example, instantaneous Current is the value 8 and instantaneous Watts is the value 2, so setting parameter 102 to a value of 10 will result in both instantaneous Current and instantaneous Watts to be reported.See the full description of the parameter values for other possible settings.
Report Accumulated kWh of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Watts of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 1.
Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 2.

Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 2.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 1.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 2.
Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 1.
Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 2.

name.lang: To set which report need to be sent.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure which reports need to be sent in Report Group 3.The values corresponding to the first four bits of the parameter value may be combined to create different combinations of reports that you wish to have sent.For example, instantaneous Current is the value 8 and instantaneous Watts is the value 2, so setting parameter 103 to a value of 10 will result in both instantaneous Current and instantaneous Watts to be reported.See the full description of the parameter values for other possible settings.
Report Accumulated kWh of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Watts of whole HEM.
Report Instantaneous Voltage of whole HEM.

name.lang: Set the interval time of sending report.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the interval time of sending report in Report Group 1. (The unit of time is second).
Interval Seconds

name.lang: Set the interval time of sending report.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the interval time of sending report in Report Group 2. (The unit of time is second).
Interval Seconds

name.lang: Set the interval time of sending report.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the interval time of sending report in Report Group 3. (The unit of time is second).
Interval Seconds
Enable /disable reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command. (0 = disable, 1 = enable)
Disable CRC-16 Encapsulation.
Enable CRC-16 Encapsulation.

This parameter is used to configure the energy detection mode when the parameter 101~103 have been configured:0 = report Wattage and the absolute KWH value;1 = report positive/negative Wattage and the algebraic sum KWH value;2 = report positive/negative Wattage and the positive KWH value (consuming electricity);3 = report positive/negative Wattage and the negative KWH value (generating electricity).
report positive/negative Wattage and the algebraic sum KWH value;
report Wattage and the absolute KWH value;
report positive/negative Wattage and the positive KWH value (consuming electricity);
report positive/negative Wattage and the negative KWH value (generating electricity).
This parameter is used to configure the partner ID. (0== Aeon Labs Standard Product, 1~255== others).
Aeon Labs Standard Product
Partner ID of Partner Product
This parameter is used to enable/disable Lock all configuration parameters.(0 =disable, 1 = enable)
All configuration parameters are configurable.
All configuration parameters are not configurable (Locked).
This parameter is used to reset product to default factory setting. (There are just 2 values can be used).
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.
Resets all configuration parameters to default setting.

name.lang: Enable/Disable the function of parameter 4 and 11.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable the function of parameter 4 and 10.(0 == disable, 1 == enable)
Disable the function of parameter 4 and 11.
Enable the function of parameter 4 and 11.

name.lang: Induce a automatic report of whole HEM.

description.lang: This parameter is used to induce an automatic report (total wattage) when the change of the current power is more/less than the threshold in wattage.
The threshold can be set from 0 to 32767 watt.

name.lang: Induce a automatic report of Channel 1.

description.lang: This parameter is used to induce an automatic report (Channel 1) when the change of the power is more/less than the threshold in wattage.
The threshold can be set from 0 to 32767 watt.

name.lang: Induce an automatic report of Channel 2.

description.lang: This parameter is used to induce an automatic report (Channel 2) when the change of the power is more/less than the threshold in wattage.
The threshold can be set from 0 to 32767 watt.

name.lang: Induce an automatic report of whole HEM.

description.lang: This parameter is used to induce an automatic report (total wattage) when the change of the current power is more/less than the threshold in percentage.
The threshold can be set from 0 to 100 percent.

name.lang: Induce an automatic report of Channel 1.

description.lang: This parameter is used to induce an automatic report (Channel 1) when the change of the current power is more/less than the threshold in percentage.
The threshold can be set from 0 to 100 percent.
